briefdescription.para: Reads actual humidity from uncompensated humidity.

simplesect.para: returns the value in relative humidity (rH)
Return the actual humidity in floating point

briefdescription.para: Reads actual humidity from uncompensated humidity.

simplesect.para: Returns the value in rH as unsigned 32bit integer in Q22.10 format(22 integer 10 fractional bits).
An output value of 42313 represents 42313 / 1024 = 41.321 rH
Return the actual relative humidity output as u32

briefdescription.para: Reads actual humidity from uncompensated humidity.

simplesect.para: Returns the value in rH as unsigned 16bit integer
An output value of 42313 represents 42313/512 = 82.643 rH
Return the actual relative humidity output as u16

briefdescription.para: Reads actual pressure from uncompensated pressure.

simplesect.para: Returns pressure in Pa as double.
Output value of "96386.2" equals 96386.2 Pa = 963.862 hPa.
Return the actual pressure in floating point

briefdescription.para: Reads actual pressure from uncompensated pressure.

simplesect.para: Returns the value in Pascal(Pa) Output value of "96386" equals 96386 Pa = 963.86 hPa = 963.86 millibar
Return the actual pressure output as u32

briefdescription.para: Reads actual pressure from uncompensated pressure.

simplesect.para: Returns the value in Pa as unsigned 32 bit integer in Q24.8 format (24 integer bits and 8 fractional bits).
Output value of "24674867" represents 24674867 / 256 = 96386.2 Pa = 963.862 hPa
Return the actual pressure in u32

briefdescription.para: Reads actual pressure from uncompensated pressure.
Reads actual temperature from uncompensated temperature.

simplesect.para: returns the value in Degree centigrade
Return the actual temperature in floating point

briefdescription.para: Reads actual temperature from uncompensated temperature.

simplesect.para: Returns the value in 0.01 degree Centigrade Output value of "5123" equals 51.23 DegC.

briefdescription.para: Reads actual temperature from uncompensated temperature.

simplesect.para: Returns the value with 500LSB/DegC centred around 24 DegC output value of "5123" equals(5123/500)+24 = 34.246DegC
Return the actual temperature as s16 output

briefdescription.para: Computing waiting time for sensor data read.

parameterdescription.para: : The value of delay time for force mode

briefdescription.para: This API is used to calibration parameters used for calculation in the registers.
This API is used to reads filter setting in the register 0xF5 bit 3 and 4.

parameterdescription.para: : The value of IIR filter coefficient

briefdescription.para: This API used to read uncompensated temperature,pressure and humidity in forced mode.
This API is used to get the humidity oversampling setting in the register 0xF2 bits from 0 to 2.

parameterdescription.para: : The value of humidity over sampling

briefdescription.para: This API is used to get the pressure oversampling setting in the register 0xF4 bits from 2 to 4.
This API is used to get the temperature oversampling setting in the register 0xF4 bits from 5 to 7.

parameterdescription.para: : The value of temperature over sampling

briefdescription.para: This API used to get the Operational Mode from the sensor in the register 0xF4 bit 0 and 1.

parameterdescription.para:
: The value of power mode
value
mode
0x00
BME280_SLEEP_MODE
0x01 and 0x02
BME280_FORCED_MODE
0x03
BME280_NORMAL_MODE

briefdescription.para: This API used to get the sensor SPI mode(communication type) in the register 0xF5 bit 0.

parameterdescription.para:
: The value of SPI enable
value
Description
0
Disable
1
Enable

briefdescription.para: This API used to Read the standby duration time from the sensor in the register 0xF5 bit 5 to 7.

: The value of standby duration time value.
value
standby duration
0x00
BME280_STANDBY_TIME_1_MS
0x01
BME280_STANDBY_TIME_63_MS
0x02
BME280_STANDBY_TIME_125_MS
0x03
BME280_STANDBY_TIME_250_MS

briefdescription.para: This function is used for initialize the bus read and bus write functions and assign the chip id and I2C address of the BME280 sensor chip id is read in the register 0xD0 bit from 0 to 7.

simplesect.para: While changing the parameter of the bme280_t

consider the following point: Changing the reference value of the parameter will changes the local copy or local reference make sure your changes will not affect the reference value of the parameter (Better case don't change the reference value of the parameter)

briefdescription.para: This API used to read true pressure, temperature and humidity.
This API reads the data from the given register.
This API is used to read uncompensated humidity. in the registers 0xF7, 0xF8 and 0xF9.
This API is used to read uncompensated pressure. in the registers 0xF7, 0xF8 and 0xF9.
This API used to read uncompensated pressure,temperature and humidity.
This API is used to read uncompensated temperature in the registers 0xFA, 0xFB and 0xFC.
This API is used to write filter setting in the register 0xF5 bit 3 and 4.

parameterdescription.para: : The value of IIR filter coefficient

briefdescription.para: This API is used to set the humidity oversampling setting in the register 0xF2 bits from 0 to 2.

parameterdescription.para: : The value of humidity over sampling

simplesect.para: The "BME280_CTRL_HUMIDITY_REG_OVERSAMP_HUMIDITY" register sets the humidity data acquisition options of the device.
changes to this registers only become effective after a write operation to "BME280_CTRL_MEAS_REG" register.
In the code automated reading and writing of "BME280_CTRL_HUMIDITY_REG_OVERSAMP_HUMIDITY"
register first set the "BME280_CTRL_HUMIDITY_REG_OVERSAMP_HUMIDITY" and then read and write the "BME280_CTRL_MEAS_REG" register in the function.

briefdescription.para: This API is used to set the pressure oversampling setting in the register 0xF4 bits from 2 to 4.
This API is used to set the temperature oversampling setting in the register 0xF4 bits from 5 to 7.

parameterdescription.para: : The value of temperature over sampling

briefdescription.para: This API used to set the Operational Mode from the sensor in the register 0xF4 bit 0 and 1.

parameterdescription.para:
: The value of power mode
value
mode
0x00
BME280_SLEEP_MODE
0x01 and 0x02
BME280_FORCED_MODE
0x03
BME280_NORMAL_MODE

briefdescription.para: Used to reset the sensor The value 0xB6 is written to the 0xE0 register the device is reset using the complete power-on-reset procedure.

simplesect.para: Soft reset can be easily set using bme280_set_softreset().

briefdescription.para: This API used to set the sensor SPI mode(communication type) in the register 0xF5 bit 0.

parameterdescription.para:
: The value of SPI enable
value
Description
0
Disable
1
Enable

: The value of standby duration time value.
value
standby duration

BME280_STANDBY_TIME_1_MS
0x01
BME280_STANDBY_TIME_63_MS

BME280_STANDBY_TIME_125_MS
0x03
BME280_STANDBY_TIME_250_MS
0x04
BME280_STANDBY_TIME_500_MS
0x05
BME280_STANDBY_TIME_1000_MS
0x06
BME280_STANDBY_TIME_2000_MS
0x07
BME280_STANDBY_TIME_4000_MS

simplesect.para: Normal mode comprises an automated perpetual cycling between an (active) Measurement period and an (inactive) standby period.
The standby time is determined by the contents of the register t_sb. Standby time can be set using BME280_STANDBY_TIME_125_MS.

briefdescription.para: This API write the data to the given register.
